Entries.default: "It's good to get the bridge out from under me."
"When you are ready to face your foe, I'll be at your side."
"Was your friend touched by Ondra? I never saw one like him in Readceras."
"You travel with one of the Stormfolk? What interesting company you keep."
"I never faced a dragon in life. But for you I will try."
"Tell that imp of yours to keep a civil tongue."
"Waste no time. When our task is finished, oblivion awaits."
"When you call on me, I will unleash the fury of the Godhammer upon your foes."
